scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && rm -rf dist dist-main dist-post && ncc build dist-ts/main.js -o dist-main --source-map && ncc build dist-ts/post.js -o dist-post --source-map && mkdir -p dist && mv dist-main/index.js dist/main.js && mv dist-main/index.js.map dist/main.js.map && mv dist-main/sourcemap-register.js dist/sourcemap-register.js && mv dist-post/index.js dist/post.js && mv dist-post/index.js.map dist/post.js.map && mv dist-post/sourcemap-register.js dist/sourcemap-register.js && rm -rf dist-main dist-post
